files.name: main.tf
files.content:
# No resources to provision
# The codebase is empty and does not require any AWS infrastructure at this time.

files.name: README.md
files.content:
# Terraform Configuration

This directory is intended to contain Terraform configuration files for provisioning AWS infrastructure. However, the current codebase is empty and does not define any deployable components or AWS resources. No Terraform resources are required at this time.

If application code or infrastructure requirements are added in the future, appropriate Terraform files can be generated here.
